Title: Business Intelligence Toolkit
Description: Business Intelligence Toolkit (BIT) is a set of WPF controls which can be used for visualization large amounts of data.
HomeWiki:
Business Intelligence Toolkit (BIT) is a set of WPF controls which can be used for visualization large amounts of data.

Features of the controls list:

  • Virtualization
  • Animated scrolling
  • MVVM friendly
  • High performance
